heroes.name: Water Hero
heroes.description: The Water Hero can control and manipulate water in all its forms. They can generate powerful water blasts, create tidal waves, and shape water into various constructs. This hero can also breathe underwater and swim at incredible speeds, making them highly effective in aquatic environments and capable of powerful, versatile attacks.

heroes.name: Earth Hero
heroes.description: The Earth Hero has the ability to control and manipulate the earth. They can cause seismic tremors, create and shape rock formations, and manipulate soil and minerals. This hero can also generate protective barriers of earth and command the ground to form defensive structures or launch powerful earth-based attacks.

heroes.name: Wind Hero
heroes.description: The Wind Hero can control and manipulate the air, creating powerful gusts and tornadoes. They can generate strong winds to propel themselves through the air, deflect objects, and create cutting air blades.
